desc: A diverse assortment of traditional North Indian dishes.
Delicious Italian pizza topped with cheese and various toppings.
Classic stir-fried noodles with vegetables and sauces.
Creamy and flavorful Italian pasta with a variety of sauces.
Buttery and flaky flatbread served with pickles or yogurt.
Fragrant rice cooked with spices and tender pieces of meat or vegetables.
Juicy burger with a variety of fillings and fresh veggies.
Soft, spongy cakes with various flavors and frosting.
Authentic Chinese dishes, including stir-fries and fried rice.
Spicy chickpeas served with fried puffed bread.
Crispy, thin South Indian crepe served with chutney and sambar.
Sweet syrup-soaked deep-fried dough balls.
Creamy, rich ice creams in a variety of flavors.
Steamed rice cakes served with chutney and sambar.
Comforting rice and lentil dish, cooked with mild spices.
Fried, puffed Indian bread served with a side of curry.
Delicious vegetarian dishes with a variety of flavors.
Stuffed flatbread rolls with spiced fillings of your choice.
Fresh vegetable salads with a light dressing.
Flavorful South Indian dishes with coconut-based curries and chutneys.
